CustomField.description: Specifies a division for further matching options. Typically this will be the related SObject name (Example: "Account", "Intake__c"), but may represent a non-SObject, arbitrary, category (Example: "SalesActivity").. This helps to filter subscriptions better.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies a division for further matching options. Typically this will be the related SObject name (Example: "Account", "Intake__c"), but may represent a non-SObject, arbitrary, category (Example: "SalesActivity").. This helps to filter subscriptions be
CustomField.label: Event Category
